2:
God looks down from heaven on the children of mankind\q to see if there are any who understand,
\q who seek after him.
\q
3:
They have all turned away. Together they have become corrupt.\q There is not one who does good, not even one.


\q
4:
Do those who commit iniquity have no understandingâ€”\q those who devour my people as if they were eating bread
\q and they do not call on God?
\q
6:
Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion!\q When God brings back his people from the captivity,
\q then Jacob will rejoice and Israel will be glad!
